about_the_game:
Visit your hero’s bloodiest nightmares with the KR Legendary Palace - Wendigo Tileset! Kokoro Reflections continues their Legendary Palace series with a set of tiles stained crimson where not only do the walls have eyes, but they’re watching you! A1, A2, A4, A5, and B tiles are ready to coat your maps with different shades of red to create a truly terrible dungeon filled with ponds of blood and shattered bones.

This pack also includes a sample map for MZ so you can see each tile’s passability and gain inspiration for how to make each map as horrific as possible. Pick up the KR Legendary Palace - Wendigo Tileset and scare your heroes and players alike with bloody hallways and deadly throne rooms!



Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Blood pools with various edge tiles
Skin, blood, muscle, and fat ground tiles
Bruising tiles
Crack texture
and more!

Walls:

Walls that match the floor tiles, plus stone and tile walls in multiple colors!

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
windows (large and small)
treasure chest (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
bone fragments
assorted eyes
blood splatters
plus more!

Events and Animations

Includes matching treasure chest and blood drop.
